channel.title: Elfchild's Panda Show
channel.itunes:subtitle: I like my coffee just like I like my women-- black, bitter and preferably fair trade.
channel.itunes:author: Justin and Dani
channel.description: Justin is 25. Daniel is 27. They are both gay. (But not TOO gay?) They enjoy sitting around, talking to the wonderful listeners who faithfully download each episode. If you like general dorkiness and not-so-serious discussions... well... then this show is for you!

item.title: Ep. 12(b): Titanic, Racism and Boobs (Not Necessarily in That Order)
item.itunes:author: Justin and Dani
item.itunes:summary:
In this disastrous add-on to our most recent episode, we discuss our outing to see 'Titanic' in all it's IMAX-y, 3D glory. Bear with us-- this one sucks a bit.

item.title: Episode 11 (Pt.1): Movies of 2010: The Birth

item.itunes:summary:

The recording ran long and I (Justin) decided to keep it in one piece because the whole affair will already be a multi-part batch of goodness when we're finished talking about the other movies on our magical little list. item.title: Tunnel-style Rambling
item.itunes:author: Justin and Dani
item.itunes:summary:
Hey all. This is Justin. [That's me!] Ok... I like to ramble. And so... here I am... rambling. I sort of update a bit as I do so [that is to say that I semi-explain the lack of recent episodes in the process]. I recorded this around midnight on November 19th. I'm sorry if I seem all sixes and sevens. *hugs*
Oh yeah... I'm in a fake tunnel. Yay!

item.title: Ep. 4 (Pt. 2): Skype Orgy, Anyone?
item.itunes:author: Justin and Dani
item.itunes:summary:
I'm not really going to give a description this time around, as I'm too busy nerding out and watching "KAPOW! Superhero Science" on The Science Channel. Oh... what the hell... a little description. Ok, so the first episode bit ran long... sorry. But we redeem ourselves with the 2nd part here... which is... er... long too. But it's filled with goodness, like Justin and Dani's gay pride-related babbling intro! Plus: The Frost Bank lady, Hannah's answering machine, and Justin's drag queen ex-boyfriend [delightful ol' Jamie] who joins in on the conversation for an extremely horrible, funny, badly planned podcast. It's truly worth downloading for the overlapping conversations alone. Hehehe. Four people talking over Skype at one time is quite the experience to behold, and provides those oh-so-lovely glitches toward the end of the episode.
*Note for any Potter nerds who may yell at me: At the time this was recorded, the release date for OOTP was still July 13th. It was later changed to July 11th, but it was too late to really fix in the recording. If you bitch about it, I'll go Bellatrix on yo' ass!
* Our podcast is possessed and buggy * "Do not encourage the furries!" * Watersports, you say? * "I smell patchouli!" * Frost Bank time is... * Gay pride! * Time to call Hannah! * Purse pun! Hooray! * Minty, milky cat semen! * Jamie's cult meeting... * "Oh... sweet Jesus..." * Mikey's suspiciously aware of dendrophilia... * Justin's new mesh boxers, and the penis therein. * "Left testicle, brown. Right testicle, ecru." * Obligatory Joan Crawford reference... * Justin isn't ethnic enough, apparently... * Snoop Dogg can't stay away! * Obligatory Harry Potter reference... * Barack Obama... Osama... so confusing... * Cheer up, straight Jacob! * Burning in Hell this week?

item.title: The Lost Episode
item.itunes:author: Justin and Dani
item.itunes:summary: This episode was recorded on Christmas Day [2005], but was never added to the podcast feed, and was never heard by anyone [as far as I remember]. Dani's introduction was recorded specifically for this release, and was not part of the original recording. His voice and the theme song were edited in before adding the episode to the feed. Neither were ever actually included in the original format of the show, pre-2006.

item.title: Myspace Q + A
item.itunes:author: Justin and Dani
item.itunes:summary: Hannah, my lovable lezzie pal, sent a Myspace bulletin with a bunch of questions. Instead of simply filling out the answers and sending it back, I decided to hand the questions to Daniel and have him interview me. This was originally only intended for my friends on Myspace, but I decided to add it to the podcast feed for you lovely listeners. Enjoy!

item.title: Ep. 3 (Part 2) - Low Heels for Ho' Heels
item.itunes:author: Justin and Dani
item.itunes:summary:
Happy Birthday, Justin! [Er... on August 4th, that is.] As you probably know, this is still episode 3. But this time, it's part 2. Isn't that magical? Part two, of course, means there's a part one. If you haven't listened to part one, then go do so... right now! Part two is totally bogus without part one. It's just mental. And I apologize for the little background sound, but my doofus boyfriend wouldn't turn off his fan and radio before recording. RAWR!
*Thank you, Zillafag! *Mongolian Cluster F-ck, anyone? *Props to Joseph, Oregon! *Tacos for Jesus? *Dani and I aren't Paris Hilton. *Yosemite Sam mudflaps are sooooo 2005. *Dani says Chinese people will eat your pets. *Another fine "Burning In Hell" segment is upon us (for real this time). *Justin explains why Starbucks lady is not burning in hell. *We save sinners, unlike those blasphemous Mormons! *Book Recommendations (oh, dear)! *Justin's a shill for the advertising industry. *The Panda Show is the Hindenburg of podcasting! *The rain in Ohio falls mainly in the blimp hangar. *Justin's not a slut. Dani, on the other hand... *Justin's clumsy with the ladies and loves his Magic Shell. *"I voted for the tree."

Links: The Clintons - http://www.clintonsband.com Drink 'Til We're Funny - http://www.dtwfpodcast.com Amanda Steinstein / Feast of Fools - http://www.feastoffools.net Pioneer Snacks - http://www.pioneersnacks.com Melissa Anelli - http://www.penbitten.com The Leaky Cauldron - http://www.leakynews.com or http://www.the-leaky-cauldron.org Jing Jing's Things - http://jingjing.spreadshirt.com Podsafe Music Network - http://music.podshow.com Farscape - http://www.scifi.com/farscape/
Extended Notes: First off, I apologize for the bad sound quality. Dani and I ended up talking longer than intended, which made the filesize larger. [It was 134mb when I finished editing.] And to get that large filesize to a smaller filesize, I had to lower the bit rate. The problem is that the lower the bit rate, the lower the quality. And to get the filesize below 50mb, I had to lower the bit rate to 80kbps. Sadly, the quality suffered. If I'd gone below 80kbps, the sound quality would be sooooooooo not worth listening to.
Next time, I'll try to keep the podcast under an hour, so that the filesize won't be freakish and the sound quality won't suck so much. So again, please bear with me. Episode 3 won't suck so much, and will be smaller and well-planned [hopefully]. *kisses for everyone* Enjoy the show!
